title: Arclight Vel'Koz skin disabled?
body: uhm why cant i use it??

replies.body:
>Network Operations â€“ 11:04 AM
Dragon Trainer Lulu, Winter Wonder Lulu,** Arclight Vel'Koz**, Pulsefire Ezreal and Triumphant Ryze are temporarily disabled while we work on fixing a bug with the skins.

If you want more details I suggest checking NA/EU boards.
